attributes.action: Investigate HMRC's massacre of Glasgow Rangers
attributes.additional_details: HMRC made claims of over £14m against Glasgow Rangers which led to the then Glasgow Rangers going into receivership. It has now been proven through the courts that the HMRC had no grounds for this witch hunt. Why were they allowed to pursue a case that they should have realised they could not win and why did their oligarchs allow them to do so??
